SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Action
The abstract base class representing an action to be performed by an invoker.
ActionProxy
Proxy class for actions that adds actions to the controller and creates dynamic proxies using reflection.
ActionResult
Represents the result of an action performed by an Action.
Adder
Class representing an addition operation.
BigGroup
Implementation of a distribution policy that assigns actions in groups to invokers.
Controller
The `Controller` class is a central component responsible for managing the execution of actions using a set of invokers.
CountWords
Class representing a word counting operation.
DistributionPolicy
Interface representing a distribution policy for actions among invokers.
DynamicProxy
Dynamic Proxy class that implements the InvocationHandler interface for method invocation.
Factorial
Class representing a factorial operation.
GreedyGroup
Implementation of a distribution policy that greedily assigns actions to available invokers.
InsufficientMemoryException
Exception thrown when there is insufficient memory to perform an operation.
InterfaceAction
Interface representing an action to be performed by an invoker.
InterfaceInvoker
Interface representing an invoker that can perform actions.
Invoker
Represents an invoker that can execute a list of actions.
InvokerCacheDecorator
Decorator for Invoker that adds the functionality to check the Invoker cache to see if an action is already in the cache to avoid wasting execution resources.
InvokerChronometerDecorator
Decorator for Invoker that adds functionality to print all the execution time of this Invoker and its metrics.

MainChronoDecorator
 
MainMapReduceFrom10Files
 
MainMapReduceFrom10FilesThreads
 
MainMapReduceString
 
MainObserver
 
MainPolicyBigGroup
 
MainPolicyGreedyGroup
 
MainPolicyRoundRobin
 
MainPolicyUniformGroup
 
MainReflection
 
MainThreads
 
Metric
Represents a metric capturing performance and resource usage information for an action execution.
Multiplier
Class representing a multiplication operation.
Observer
Interface representing an observer that receives updates on metrics.
Reduce
Class representing the Reduce phase in a MapReduce operation.
RoundRobin
Implementation of a distribution policy that assigns actions in a round-robin fashion to invokers.
RoundRobinImproved
Implementation of a distribution policy that assigns actions in a round-robin fashion to invokers.
TextReader
Class for reading the content of a text file and returning it as a string.
UniformGroup
Implementation of a distribution policy that evenly distributes actions among invokers in groups.
WordCount
Class representing a word count operation.
